titleStmt.title: A late printed sermon against false prophets, vindicated by letter, from the causeless aspersions of Mr. Francis Cheynell. / By Jasper Mayne, D.D. the mis-understood author of it.
titleStmt.author: Mayne, Jasper, 1604-1672.

publicationStmt.date: Printed in the yeare, M DC XLVII. [1647]

notesStmt.note: The roman numeral date in imprint is made with turned C's.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
